name: K-Drama & Asian Series Index (V2)
description: Curated sources specializing in high-quality Japanese, Korean, Chinese and international dramas and TV shows.
author: Kiyomi Community Content

providers.name: Nyaa (Asian Series)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Excellent for fan-subbed, raw, and niche Asian series and documentaries.

providers.name: The Pirate Bay (General/Archival)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: A general index useful for finding established or internationally popular K-Dramas.
providers.cautionReason: Search results are often unverified and may contain malicious files.

providers.name: Knaben (API)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Modern, fast search API offering structured results, including many East Asian releases.

providers.name: TorrentsCSV (Aggregated Data)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: A collaborative git repository of torrents, consisting of a single, searchable torrents.csv file. It stores torrents with at least one seeder

providers.name: TokyoTosho
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Contains some obscure or older niche J-Drama, C-Drama & K-Drama files.
providers.cautionReason: Non-video content (e.g., games, software, archives) may contain malware.

providers.name: UIndex
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: UIndex is primarily a BitTorrent tracker site, similar to Russian tracker RuTracker.org. You can find the latest Asian drama content here!
providers.cautionReason: Search results are often unverified and may contain malicious files.

providers.name: BTDigg
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Global search engine utilizing the DHT network; useful for finding large, long-tail archives of older Asian series.
providers.cautionReason: Search results are often unverified and may contain malicious files.

providers.name: CloudTorrents (API)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Modern API-based indexer; useful for locating structured TV series results when niche trackers fail.

providers.name: FileMood
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: General indexer specializing in file search, requires manual magnet link construction. May contain niche or old series.

providers.name: TorrentDownload
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Public indexer; useful as a reliable backup.

providers.name: LimeTorrents (Public RSS)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: General Torrents Download indexer; good for widely distributed international series releases.
providers.cautionReason: Unverified public indexer. Contains potentially harmful/mislabelled torrents.

providers.name: Snowfl
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: General meta-search engine providing results from multiple sources; excellent for checking title availability across many trackers.
providers.cautionReason: External meta-search results can be unverified.
